Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, S.2082/A.3474 to create the New York State Working Families Tax Credit.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Create the New York State Working Families Tax Credit (S.2082/A.3474).

Items.Title: Resolution calling on New York state to create a program to provide food benefits for those not eligible for existing benefits, including anyone over 55 meeting income eligibility.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Create a program to provide food benefits for those not eligible for existing benefits, including anyone over 55 meeting income eligibility.
